designPrinciple: High-end, classic elegance meets modern minimalism. Focus on spacious layouts, strong typography contrast, and exceptional media showcase.

structureAndLayout.contentWidth: Content should be constrained using a generous `max-w-7xl` or similar for wide, airy feel.

spacing.sectionSeparator: Massive vertical spacing (`py-24` to `py-32`) to create distinct, high-end sections.
spacing.componentGaps: Generous gaps (`gap-x-12`, `gap-y-16`) between internal components and text blocks.

primary.name: Main Blue
primary.use: Primary Call-to-Action (CTA) buttons, navigation accents, important links.

secondary.name: Secondary Orange
secondary.use: Secondary CTA, subtle highlights, decorative lines.

background.name: White
background.use: Main background, base color for most sections.

accentBackground.name: Beige
accentBackground.use: Alternating section backgrounds (e.g., Mission Statement or Stats blocks), subtle texture.

textPrimary.name: Black
textPrimary.use: All main body text, headlines, and black elements.

headlineFont.weight: Use semi-bold (600) or bold (700) for large display headlines.
headlineFont.use: H1, H2, H3, and all major section titles. Loaded from /public/fonts/

bodyFont.use: Body text, navigation links, button text, and subtitles.
bodyFont.implementation: Google Fonts CDN or local files

sizes.h1: Oversized (`text-6xl` to `text-8xl`), especially in the Hero section, scaling down on mobile.

buttons.style: Rounded corners (`rounded-md`). Solid fill. Smooth hover transitions with scale and shadow.
buttons.primaryCTA: Background: Main Blue (`#154363`). Text: White (`#FFFCFB`). Hover: scale, shadow-xl.
buttons.secondaryCTA: Background: Orange (`#e2a347`). Text: Black. Hover: darken, lift.
buttons.animations: All buttons MUST have hover:scale-105 and transition-all duration-300

heroSection.overlay: Light semi-transparent overlay (`bg-black/35`) to show video.
heroSection.headerTransition: Transparent header over hero, becomes solid white on scroll.

statsBlock.style: Large numbers in GFS Didot with orange badges. Body text in Sofia Sans.
statsBlock.badges: Use orange (`#e2a347`) for '500+ attendees' style badges.
statsBlock.animations: Counter animations on scroll into view.

dynamicStyling.nonRectangularForms: Use diagonal SVG dividers or CSS skew transforms between sections to break monotony.
dynamicStyling.colorDensity: Newsletter and Footer MUST use solid Primary Blue (#154363) background.
dynamicStyling.orangeAccents: Bold use of Secondary Orange (#e2a347) for badges, highlights, and CTAs in dark sections.

microAnimations.scrollAnimations: Fade-in and slide-up animations for all major sections using Intersection Observer.
microAnimations.cardHovers: Concert cards: hover:shadow-xl and hover:-translate-y-2 with smooth transitions.
microAnimations.buttonHovers: All buttons: hover:scale-105, background darken, smooth transition.

uiComponents.i18nImplementation: Language switch component in header with bordered button design. Shows 'EN' or 'RO'.
